contribute to the design project of building a flagellum. In essentials, how-
ever, this is precisely parallel to an old creationist strategy, just the one that
Darwin sidestepped in the case of the eye. Behe has specified how the inter-
mediates are to be formed, and it isn’t surprising that his preferred scenario
